wikipedia_page.main: Spencer Joshua Alwyne Compton, 2nd Marquess of Northampton  (2 January 1790 – 17 January 1851), known as Lord Compton from 1796 to 1812 and as Earl Compton from 1812 to 1828, was a British nobleman and patron of science and the arts.
